name: Imageloader Samples Copy Schema
description: Schema for CM4AI imageloader input file samplescopy.csv

if_plate_id.description: Identifies which IF plate the experiment took place on

position.description: The Position of the well for this image in a plate of IF exepriments

sample.description: Identifies the sample which was placed in this well

locations.description: Cellular Compartments in which the tagged protien was identified through the IF images

antibody.description: Antibody Identifier from Human Protien Atlas or negative control

ensembl_ids.description: Ensembl Gene ID for protien antibody targets, may have multiple matches

gene_name.description: Gene Symbol for the tagged protien
